remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是用于生成基于数据库架构的 web 页模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架来生成基于 Web 的用户界面，可让用户能够查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 此类使用属性来启用基架动态数据网站中。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding in a Dynamic Data Web Site. 基架动态显示基于数据模型不需要的物理页面的页面，从而增强了 ASP.NET 页框架。Scaffolding enhances ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. 基架提供以下功能：Scaffolding provides the following capabilities: - 最小或没有代码，以创建数据驱动的 Web 应用程序。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 缩短开发时间。Quick development time. - 页面，被完全正常运行，并且包括显示、 插入、 编辑、 删除、 排序和分页功能。Pages that are fully functional and include display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Built-in data validation that is based on the database schema. - 创建的筛选器针对每个外键或布尔字段。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 此类可以用于启用或禁用通过将此属性应用于表示表的类中的适当的数据字段对象的数据模型中的数据列的基架。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data columns in a data model by applying this attribute to the appropriate data field object in the class that represents the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将基架属性应用于产品分部类中的 ProductID 对象并将其设置为公开的 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中的产品表的 ProductID 列`true.`它会隐藏通过将基架属性应用于 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 对象并将其设置为 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 列`false`。The following code example exposes the ProductID column of the Products table in the AdventureWorksLT data base by applying the scaffold property to the ProductID object in the Products partial class and setting it to `true.` It hides the ThumbnailPhotoFileName column by applying the scaffold property to the ThumbnailPhotoFileName object and setting it to `false`. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(ProductMetadata))] public partial class Product { } public class ProductMetadata { [ScaffoldColumn(true)] public object ProductID; [ScaffoldColumn(false)] public object ThumbnailPhotoFileName; } ``` ```vb Public Partial Class Product End Class Public Class ProductMetadata Public ProductID As Object Public ThumbnailPhotoFileName As Object End Class ``` 若要编译该示例代码，你需要以下各项：To compile the example code, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 示例数据库的正确版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 这可用于创建数据库和包含要自定义的数据字段的类和要重写的方法的数据上下文。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它将创建要在其中使用上述页面的环境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).
